items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript module (static-firebase-rtdb) for simplifying Firebase Realtime Database interactions in static frontend projects. Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.
items.title: ramithwork/frontend-firebase-rtdb: A lightweight JavaScript module (static-firebase-rtdb) for simplifying Firebase Realtime Database interactions in static frontend projects. Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.
